pages.text: Wa Law Ja`alnahu Malakaan Laja`alnahu Rajulaan Wa Lalabasna `Alayhim Ma Yalbisuna
Wa Laqadi Astuhzi'a Birusulin Min Qablika Fahaqa Bial-Ladhina Sakhiru Minhum Ma Kanu Bihi Yastahzi'un
Qul Siru Fi Al-'Ari Thumma Anzuru Kayfa Kana `Aqibatu Al-Mukadhibina
Qul Liman Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ari Qul Lillahi Kataba `Ala Nafsihi Ar-Rahmata Layajma`annakum 'Ila Yawmi Al-Qiyamati La Rayba Fihi Al-Ladhina Khasiru 'Anfusahum Fahum La Yu'uminuna
Wa Lahu Ma Sakana Fi Al-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Huwa As-Sami`u Al-`Alimu
Qul 'Aghayra Allahi 'Attakhidhu Waliyaan Fatiri As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ari Wa Huwa Yut`imu Wa La Yut`amu Qul 'Inni 'Umirtu 'An 'Akuna 'Awwala Man 'Aslama Wa La Takunanna Mina Al-Mushrikina
Man Yusraf `Anhu Yawma'idhin Faqad Rahimahu Wa Dhalika Al-Fawzu Al-Mubinu
Wa 'In Yamsaska Allahu Biurrin Fala Kashifa Lahu 'Illa Huwa Wa 'In Yamsaska Bikhayrin Fahuwa `Ala Kulli Shay'in Qadirun
Wa Huwa Al-Qahiru Fawqa `Ibadihi Wa Huwa Al-Hakimu Al-Khabiru
